p: Liquid-liquid extraction can be used to enrich particular lignans in extracts before purification. For instance, partition between n-hexane and water enriched piperitol and pinoresinol in the water phase, and subsequent partition between water and ethyl acetate enriched both compounds in the ethyl acetate phase [ 202]. Liquid-liquid extraction into ethyl acetate was used for the purification of aglycons and mono- and diglucosides but triglucosides cannot be extracted efficiently into ethyl acetate (see Section 2.5.1).
